Up.Statement:
UPDATE w2_ShopShipping SET fixed_purchase_kbn1_setting = '1' WHERE fixed_purchase_kbn1_setting = '' AND fixed_purchase_kbn2_flg = '1'
UPDATE w2_FixedPurchase SET fixed_purchase_setting1 = '1,' + fixed_purchase_setting1 WHERE (fixed_purchase_kbn = '02') AND (CHARINDEX(',', fixed_purchase_setting1, 3) = 0)
